scripts.dev: tsup src/agent/index.ts --out-dir api --format esm --dts --watch --onSuccess "RUN_LOCAL_SERVER='true' node api/index.mjs"
scripts.vercel-build: apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libjpeg-dev libgif-dev librsvg2-dev pkg-config && npm install && tsup src/agent/index.ts --out-dir api --format esm --dts
